meta.content: Digg, pictures, technology, breaking news, entertainment, politics, headline news, celebrity news, offbeat, world business, sports, funny videos

meta.content: The most interesting and talked about stories, videos and pictures on the web. Breaking news on Technology, Politics, Entertainment, and more!

meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.a: Police Warn Of Prosecutions For Misuse Of Social Media

div.div: Police investigating the Newtown school shooting have issued a stern warning over "misinformation" regarding the case being posted online, stating that those behind fake profiles and other misleading information will be prosecuted.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y9dGcU&via=Digg&text=Police Warn Of Prosecutions For Misuse Of Social Media

div.div: Here are some of games that should have ended up in the vaporware bin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVhAju&via=Digg&text=Gaming's Biggest Disappointments Of 2012

div.div: Here are a few of the best pictures of animals caught in their natural environments by camera traps.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12iwFBZ&via=Digg&text=Best Camera-Trap Pictures Of 2012

div.div: Three of the women who risked their lives to save their students were killed in the Newtown, CT massacre.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SwWMDo&via=Digg&text=The Heroes Of Sandy Hook

div.a: A Methodical Massacre: Horror And Heroics

div.div: "Adam Lanza blasted his way into the Sandy Hook Elementary School. He fired a half-dozen thunderous rounds from a semiautomatic rifle to open a hole big enough to step through in one of the school's glass doors."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RwReZy&via=Digg&text=A Methodical Massacre: Horror And Heroics

div.a: The Woes Of An American Drone Operator

div.div: A soldier sets out to graduate at the top of his class. He succeeds, and he becomes a drone pilot working with a special unit of the United States Air Force in New Mexico. He kills dozens of people. But then, one day, he realizes that he can't do it anymore.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SWBPia&via=Digg&text=The Woes Of An American Drone Operator

div.a: Lego Recreations Of Famous Movie Scenes

div.div: You’re never too old to play with toys! Lucky for us, twenty-one year old Alex Eylar still uses his Legos to hilariously re-create some of the most famous movie scenes of our time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UUeKKl&via=Digg&text=Lego Recreations Of Famous Movie Scenes

div.a: Photographs Of 19th Century Paintings Recreated On The Human Body

div.div: For their project “Museum Anatomy,” Chiang Mai, Thailand-based artists Chadwick Gray and Laura Spector recreated and photographed old paintings from around the world on a human body instead of a canvas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZSKlg&via=Digg&text=Photographs Of 19th Century Paintings Recreated On The Human Body

div.a: If '2001: A Space Odyssey' Were Made Today, Would It Be Marketed As A Generic Action Flick?

div.div: The folks at Film School Rejects deliver an imaginary trailer for today's '"2001", recutting the original trailer in a way that calls to mind the recent spate of frenetic scifi trailers—especially those released in anticipation of "Prometheus."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZSl2m&via=Digg&text=If '2001: A Space Odyssey' Were Made Today, Would It Be Marketed As A Generic Action Flick?

div.a: I Am Facebook Friends With Ryan Lanza, Which Became A Problem

div.div: "One demanded to know how I could be friends with such a monster. Could I help a random internet sleuth create a “psychological profile”? Did I see warning signs in Ryan? Why did I suspiciously post cartoons about mass shootings only days before? That was very tasteless."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SxZYPp&via=Digg&text=I Am Facebook Friends With Ryan Lanza, Which Became A Problem

div.a: How Do You Draw The Unthinkable?

div.div: Really interesting anecdotes from NYT illustrator on creating a graphic for story on gun violence. drawger.com/edel/index.php...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SZ8lAi&via=Digg&text=How Do You Draw The Unthinkable?

div.a: The U.S. Army's Experiments With LSD In The Cold War

div.div: For decades, the U.S. Army conducted secret clinical experiments with psychochemicals at Edgewood Arsenal. In the nineteen-sixties, Army Intelligence expanded the arsenal’s work on LSD, testing the drug as an enhanced-interrogation technique in Europe and Asia.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V0A0mk&via=Digg&text=The U.S. Army's Experiments With LSD In The Cold War

div.div: NOBODY EVEN COMES CLOSE... EXCEPT YEMEN

div.a: America's Gun Culture Explained In Four Charts

div.div: These three charts show America’s gun ownership as compared to the rest of the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z8E9sA&via=Digg&text=America's Gun Culture Explained In Four Charts

div.a: How Do You Remake 'Pong' Without Software?

div.div: In a post to r/gaming, Reddit user BluesImage has detailed how he recreated Pong using only logic chips and a circuit board.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZzFDLf&via=Digg&text=How Do You Remake 'Pong' Without Software?

div.div: 'WE'LL ALWAYS HAVE THE SEA OF TRANQUILITY'

div.a: The Last Words On The Moon

div.div: So, what were the last words on spoken on the Moon 40 years ago?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U2BJGW&via=Digg&text=The Last Words On The Moon

div.a: Did Instagram's CEO Lie Under Oath?

div.div: Accounts of several people close to Twitter and Facebook, and documents reviewed by The New York Times, contradict statements Kevin Systrom made under penalty of perjury.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TV5xmj&via=Digg&text=Did Instagram's CEO Lie Under Oath?

div.div: YOUR CAFETERIA WILL NEVER BE AS GOOD

div.a: What Facebook's Epic Cafeteria Looks Like

div.div: Roman & Williams has created nostalgic interiors that most others can only emulate. Here's the lunchroom they created with Facebook.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XuWLN4&via=Digg&text=What Facebook's Epic Cafeteria Looks Like

div.div: A mother describes what it's like to have a child you love but whose mental disability terrifies you at the same time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12tyhrM&via=Digg&text=I Am Adam Lanza's Mother

div.div: POSTED ALL THEIR PERSONAL INFO ONLINE

After the haters from the infamous church posted their intentions to picket the funerals of the twenty children killed in the shooting at the Sandy Hook Elementary School, Anonymous responded by re-posting the personal and professional information for members of the church on the Internet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12gOcdS&via=Digg&text=Anonymous Hacked Westboro Baptist Church

div.div: YOU'LL NEVER ESCAPE THE IKEA MAZE

div.a: 6 Ways Retailers Trick You Into Buying More Crap

div.div: Even the savviest shoppers can be tricked into buying things they don’t want or need.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UI56Nd&via=Digg&text=6 Ways Retailers Trick You Into Buying More Crap

div.a: Cop Charged With Buying $15 iPhone From Undercover Cop

div.div: A sergeant in NYPD's Internal Affairs is caught by a sting operation set up by his fellow officers. Who would have imagined you could get an iPhone for $15?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z8bNyv&via=Digg&text=Cop Charged With Buying $15 iPhone From Undercover Cop

div.div: TERRIBLE OLD TWEETS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

div.a: Twitter Rolling Out Ability To Download All Your Tweets Today

div.div: For some, this long-awaited feature has arrived.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1801O&via=Digg&text=Twitter Rolling Out Ability To Download All Your Tweets Today

div.a: What Does It Take To Make Gun Control Happen?

div.div: One irony of the pernicious taboo on “politicizing” a tragedy is that in some especially thorny areas of policy—like, for instance, gun control—it is only a tragedy that can summon the political momentum for change.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WbJNs2&via=Digg&text=What Does It Take To Make Gun Control Happen?

div.div: MILE HIGH CLUB READIES FOR NEW MEMBERS

div.a: Southwest Owes 5.8 Million Free Beers To Passengers

div.div: Southwest Airlines has settled a class-action lawsuit filed by a Chicago attorney over the discount carrier's decision to stop honoring vouchers for free alcoholic drinks, which it had given to travelers who bought a premium ticket.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UgtPrd&via=Digg&text=Southwest Owes 5.8 Million Free Beers To Passengers

div.a: How Algorithms Secretly Shape The Way We Behave

div.div: Algorithms, the key ingredients of all significant computer programs, have probably influenced your Christmas shopping and may one day determine how you vote.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZwiBVO&via=Digg&text=How Algorithms Secretly Shape The Way We Behave

div.a: Portraits Of The Victims At Sandy Hook Elementary

div.div: Most died at the very start of their young lives, tiny victims taken in a way not fit for anyone regardless of age. Others found their life's work in sheltering little ones, teaching them, caring for them, treating them as their own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeLKjC&via=Digg&text=Portraits Of The Victims At Sandy Hook Elementary

div.a: SNL's Powerful Opening Honoring The Victims Of Sandy Hook Elementary

div.div: SNL performed an inspired opening, in which the New York City Children's Chorus paid homage to those touched by the Sandy Hook Elementary School tragedy, singing "Silent Night" by the light of a flickering candle.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SzlJhL&via=Digg&text=SNL's Powerful Opening Honoring The Victims Of Sandy Hook Elementary
